input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Santini Spot Jersey Man'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Evade X Pro Air Jersey 2.0 Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Sleeveless Jersey'
  - Name='Women's Pearl Izumi Pro Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Women's Attack Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Eclipse Pro Air LS Jersey 2.0 Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Privateer P.M Pro Air Jersey 3.0'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Evade Pro Base LS Jersey 2.0 Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Smith Castelli Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Man Castelli Superleggera 3 Jersey'
  - Name='Men's Zero-Weight SS Base Layer'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Attack Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's PRO Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Expedition Short-Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Mille GTS Jersey C2'
  - Name='Women's Pearl iZUMi Summit Long-Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Gore Wear Windstopper BL Sleeveless Bike Jersey'
  - Name='Women's MAAP Drome Pro Air Jersey 3.0'
  - Name='ASSOS Uma Gt Jersey'
  - Name='Maap Training Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Women's Evade Pro Base Long Sleeve Cycling Jersey 2.0'
  - Name='Men's MAAP Team Evo Bib short'
  - Name='ASSOS Uma Gt Summer Ss Jersey C2'
  - Name='Men's Pearl Izumi Pro Mesh Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Spot Jersey Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly relevant cycling jersey for men, likely similar performance and features as the reference Core Jersey, intended for similar use and audience.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Evade X Pro Air Jersey 2.0 Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A high-performance men's cycling jersey similar in purpose, materials, and technical features to the Pedal Mafia Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Sleeveless Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sleeveless cycling jersey differs in silhouette and coverage; still relevant as a cycling jersey but less similar in construction and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Women's Pearl Izumi Pro Thermal Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal jersey usually designed for cold weather and tailored for women; different function and likely heavier materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Women's Attack Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cycling jersey for women, similar function but differs in gender-target and possibly fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Eclipse Pro Air LS Jersey 2.0 Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long-sleeve cycling jersey for men, similar high-performance design but with different sleeve length affecting silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Privateer P.M Pro Air Jersey 3.0
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a men's cycling jersey focused on performance, similar in function and design to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve men's cycling jersey, similar technical purpose and construction to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Smith Castelli Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic high-quality men's cycling jersey, very comparable in function, style, and wearer demographic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Man Castelli Superleggera 3 Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lightweight, high-performance men's cycling jersey, very similar in use, materials, and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Zero-Weight SS Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Base layer differs significantly in function and design; not a standalone cycling jersey but an undergarment.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's short-sleeve cycling jersey similar in type and purpose to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Attack Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's cycling jersey, likely comparable in features and function to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's PRO Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance cycling jersey with similar intended use, construction, and fit as the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Expedition Short-Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Designed for longer rides or adventure cycling; relevant but may have heavier or different features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GTS Jersey C2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end men's cycling jersey, very similar in purpose, fit, and technical features.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve women's jersey differs in both gender fit and silhouette from the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sleeveless jersey with windproof materials differs in silhouette and possibly in function.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-quality cycling jersey, but 'Uma' line is typically women's, so fits differently though functionally similar.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Training cycling jersey likely shares similar construction and purpose with the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's long-sleeve cycling jersey different in gender fit and sleeve length, moderately relevant.
